function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Difference between estimated COVID-19 trend and actual trend in Wuhan","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of disease spread and effectiveness of interventions","Mitigation":"Ensure data used for estimation is specific to the region of interest","Technologies":"Data modeling and analysis tools","People":"Population of Wuhan, public health officials","Owner":"Data analysts, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Errors in case detection and data recording in Wuhan","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of disease spread and intervention effectiveness","Mitigation":"Improve case detection and data recording processes, increase transparency","Technologies":"Data recording and reporting systems","People":"Healthcare workers, data analysts, public health authorities","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Difference between population distribution and actual situation","Impact":"Inaccurate modeling of disease spread and intervention effectiveness","Mitigation":"Use accurate population distribution data for modeling and analysis","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping tools, population data sources","People":"Population of Wuhan, urban planners","Owner":"Data analysts, urban planning authorities"}]}
